channel.title: Big problem that needs to be fixed quick (command) (bringing up a window in game
channel.description:
Ok people say it's my source it's not... I tried another source it doesn't work... So don't tell me it's my server unless you got proof and you can fix it...
Ok this is what's up.. Whenever I do the ::bank command OR open up a shop manually it will d/c and then log me back in... This needs to be fixed... Also as i've seen in freescapepkz when you change you're character in the ::char command and log out and back in it would of saved you're character.. As of my server that does not happen.. So if someone could give me a solution to these.
If it's command issues and It's coded wrong please post below a little tut with you're code and how to add it and how many parts etc... Please help me quick with this I can't release my server possibly source (would be a great one)
Thanks SO MUCH,
Check my sig :)

item.title: Big problem that needs to be fixed quick (command) (bringing up a window in game

Ok people say it’s my source it’s not… I tried another source it doesn’t work… So don’t tell me it’s my server unless you got proof and you can fix it…
